books.title: The Mystery of the Yellow Room
books.author: Gaston Leroux
books.summary: A young reporter struggles to investigate a seemingly impossible crime, in which an assailant has escaped from a locked bedroom completely unseen.

books.title: I Will Repay
books.author: Baroness Orczy
books.summary: A young woman pursues revenge against the man who killed her brother in a duel years before.

books.title: The Autobiography of John Stuart Mill
books.author: John Stuart Mill
books.summary: The autobiography of English philosopher John Stuart Mill.

books.title: Queen Victoria
books.author: Lytton Strachey
books.summary: A sardonic and generally unflattering biography of Victoria Alexandrina, Queen of England.

books.title: Bambi
books.author: Felix Salten
books.summary: A roe deer learns the rules of the forest and how to survive in a world inhabited by men as he grows to maturity.

books.title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
books.author: Anita Loos
books.summary: The comic diary of a young woman recounting her escapades and romances in 1920s New York and Europe.

books.title: The Winter’s Tale
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: A king’s unfounded jealousy destroys his family and kingdom.

books.title: Russian Folktales
books.author: A. N. Afanasyev
books.summary: A collection of Russian folktales compiled by A. N. Afanasyev, translated and edited by Leonard A. Magnus.

books.title: The Monster
books.author: Edgar Saltus
books.summary: Fleeing a terrible truth, a woman remarries, but her first husband comes back for answers.

books.title: The Return
books.author: Walter de la Mare
books.summary: After visiting a graveyard, a man finds his appearance has mysteriously changed.

books.title: Essays
books.author: Henry David Thoreau
books.summary: A collection of Henry David Thoreau’s essays.

books.title: The Secret of the Caves
books.author: Franklin W. Dixon
books.summary: Four boys vacation at nearby caves only to be swept up in a mystery.

books.title: Confessions of an English Opium-Eater
books.author: Thomas De Quincey
books.summary: A portrait of the life of a drug addict in Georgian-era London.

books.title: The Age of Reason
books.author: Thomas Paine
books.summary: Paine argues against the legitimacy of the Bible and institutional religion.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: Wilfred Owen
books.summary: A collection of Wilfred Owen’s published poems.

books.title: Dodsworth
books.author: Sinclair Lewis
books.summary: A newly-retired businessman’s peaceful European trip falls apart as his wife chases high European society.

books.title: At the Earth’s Core
books.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs
books.summary: Two explorers burrow deep into the planet’s crust and emerge in a savage land inside a hollow Earth, where they have many adventures.

books.title: Golf Stories
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: A collection of Wodehouse’s golf stories featuring the Oldest Member.

books.title: Verses on Various Occasions
books.author: John Henry Newman
books.summary: A collection of poems by John Henry Newman.

books.title: Through the Brazilian Wilderness
books.author: Theodore Roosevelt
books.summary: Theodore Roosevelt’s autobiographical account of his expedition into the uncharted depths of the Brazilian rainforest.
